snippet: Freddie McGrier, of Harlem, who has served time for robbery, was arrested in connection with a fatal robbery at RC Petroleum in East Tremont.
abstract: Freddie McGrier, of Harlem, who has served time for robbery, was arrested in connection with a fatal robbery at RC Petroleum in East Tremont.

headline.main: Man, 21, Arrested in Murder of Bronx Gas-Station Worker
